definition: one full year (e.g. on child's first birthday)
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)

sentences.english: Article 21 A villagers' assembly is composed of villagers at or above the age of 18 in the village.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一條村民會議由本村十八週歲以上的村民組成。

sentences.english: Each Applicant must be aged 18 years and above.
sentences.chinese: 每一申請人須滿十八週歲及以上。

sentences.english: The applicants are required in 18-50 age range.
sentences.chinese: 報名者年齡須在18週歲以上50週歲以下。

sentences.english: The applicants are required in 18-50 age range.
sentences.chinese: 報名者年齡須在18週歲以上50週歲以下。

sentences.english: Note: Parent or guardian may sign on behalf of a minor aged less than 18 years.
sentences.chinese: 週歲的未成年人可由父母或監護人代簽。
希拉里於本週五滿60週歲。

sentences.english: Why do Koreans prefer to send their children off years, when a gold ring?
sentences.chinese: 韓國人爲什麼喜歡在孩子過週歲時送金戒指？

sentences.english: III, women pregnant or with a baby under 1 year.
sentences.chinese: 懷孕或者哺乳自己不滿1週歲嬰兒的婦女。

sentences.english: One who instigates a person under the age of eighteen to commit a crime shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 教唆不滿十八週歲的人犯罪的，應當從重處罰。

sentences.english: The State encourages voluntary blood donation by healthy citizens between ages 18 and 55.
sentences.chinese: 國家提倡十八週歲至五十五週歲的健康公民自願獻血。

sentences.english: The State encourages voluntary blood donation by healthy citizens between ages 18 and 55.
sentences.chinese: 國家提倡十八週歲至五十五週歲的健康公民自願獻血。

sentences.english: The past Thursday is sweetie's one year old birthday.
sentences.chinese: 過去的這個禮拜四是小寶的一週歲生日。

sentences.english: Around 21% were young people aged between 12 and 18.
sentences.chinese: 其中年齡在12至18週歲的青年人約佔21%。

sentences.english: Jia Jia turns 16 today. We had a little celebration for her.
sentences.chinese: 佳佳今天慶祝十六週歲生日。

sentences.english: The State encourages healthy citizens from 18 to 55 years of age to donate blood voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 國家提倡十八週歲至五十五週歲的健康公民自願獻血。

sentences.english: The State encourages healthy citizens from 18 to 55 years of age to donate blood voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 國家提倡十八週歲至五十五週歲的健康公民自願獻血。

definition: Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
length of married life/marriageable age/actual marrying age
abbr. for 大學學科能力測驗|大学学科能力测验[Da4 xue2 Xue2 ke1 Neng2 li4 Ce4 yan4]

one's age, according to the traditional Chinese method of reckoning (i.e. the number of Chinese calendar years in which one has lived). In this system, a person's age is one year at birth, and increases by one year at the beginning of the first solar term 立春[Li4 chun1] each year, rather than on one's birthday./as opposed to 足歲|足岁[zu2 sui4]/see also 實歲|实岁[shi2 sui4]
toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)
Saga county, Tibetan: Sa dga' rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
